DOC.brief_summary: The prevalence adolescent knee pain 33 % , patellofemoral pain ( PFP ) common diagnosis nontraumatic onset . The 5-year prognosis adolescent PFP compare type knee pain unknown . In 2011 , cohort 2200 adolescent age 15 19 year answer online questionnaire musculoskeletal pain . Of , 504 report knee pain , 153 clinically diagnose PFP . Now , 5 year , 504 adolescent , well 252 randomly select adolescent report knee pain 2011 , contact gain insight prognosis .
DOC.brief_title: 5 Year Follow-up Adolescents With Knee Pain
DOC.criteria: From 504 , 153 diagnose PFP , criterion include : insidious onset anterior knee retropatellar pain longer 6 week provoke least 2 follow : prolonged sit kneeling , squat , run , hopping , stair climb ; tenderness palpation patella ; pain stepping ; doubleleg squat . Exclusion criterion : concomitant injury pain hip , lumbar spine , knee structure selfreported patellofemoral instability knee joint effusion .
